title: Treasurer announces 2025 Federal Budget focus on housing
snippet: Budget signals a major housing package with transparency requirements.
text: The 2025 Federal Budget focuses on affordable housing, with measures for reporting outcomes and integrity safeguards.

title: Public Interest Disclosure (Integrity) Amendment Bill 2025
snippet: Expands protections for whistleblowers and strengthens oversight.
text: The bill extends protections for public interest disclosures and introduces audit trails for agencies.

title: Hansard: Question Time on whistleblower protections
snippet: Members debated scope and enforcement of new protections.
text: Debate centered on scope, enforcement, and the role of the new Integrity Commissioner.
